abstract: Lawmakers in Washington requested a federal investigation into mortgage lenders’ practices, and Texas’s attorney general and others called for freezes on all foreclosures.
snippet: Lawmakers in Washington requested a federal investigation into mortgage lenders’ practices, and Texas’s attorney general and others called for freezes on all foreclosures.
lead_paragraph: The uproar over bad conduct by mortgage lenders intensified Tuesday, as lawmakers in Washington requested a federal investigation and the attorney general in Texas joined a chorus of state law enforcement figures calling for freezes on all foreclosures.

headline.main: Foreclosure Furor Rises; Many Call for a Freeze
headline.print_headline: Foreclosure Furor Rises; Many Call For a Freeze

byline.original: By David Streitfeld and Gretchen Morgenson
